task.title: Reserve an elastic IP address using the User Console

taskbody.context: In this section of the lab you will use the Eucalyptus User Console to reserve a public IP address from the pool of public IP addresses available in your cloud.

step.cmd: In the User Console click the Network & Security icon and then select IP Addresses from the drop-down menu.

info.p: The Manage IP addresses window appears.

step.cmd: View the Manage IP addresses window information. Because you have not reserved any IP addresses at this point, you should not see any IP addresses listed.
In the Manage IP addresses window, click the Allocate new IP address button.

info.p: The Allocate IP addresses window opens.

step.cmd: Type 1 in the How many IP addresses would you like to allocate text box. The click the Allocate addresses from cloud button.
View the results in the Manage IP addresses window. One IP address should be reserved for user admin.
Remain logged in to the User Console.
